---
title: "Web Scraping in R"
output: html_document
---

Read data in from the internet using packages like `rvest`. Learn to navigate HTML and XML structured data files, and convert data stored in these files into tabular data more commonly used in statistical analyses.

## Timetable

Date | Description
---- | ----
1:00-1:30 | Understand the structure of HTML web pages (DOM, tags, attributes)
1:30-2:45| Use CSS and XPATH to navigate HTML pages and select HTML nodes & Extract data from HTML nodes
2:45-3:00| **Break**
3:00-4:00| Use APIs and other programmatic methods of accessing web-based data
